description:
Put your HTML, CSS and JavaScript skills into practice by building a fully customizable video player. We will start from scratch (apart from some icons that I'm going to give you at the beginning) and build our way to a YouTube video-player look-a-like. The videos will be in a step-by-step format, so that it will be easy to follow along. All source code will be available at our website.

Afterwards, you will be able to create awesome video players using the latest HTML5 video API; they will be both stunning through CSS and functional through JavaScript.
title: Create An HTML5 Video Player From Scratch
